name: Legiones Astartes
description: The Space Marine Legions of the Great Crusade and Horus Heresy

name: Adeptus Mechanicum
description: The Adeptus Mechanicus and their war machines

name: Questoris Familia
description: The noble houses of Imperial Knights

name: Solar Auxilia
description: The elite regiments of the Imperial Army, representing the finest human soldiers in the galaxy

name: Dark Angels (I Legion)
description: The I Legion, the First and the most secretive of all Legions

name: Emperor's Children (III Legion)
description: The III Legion, perfectionists and masters of close combat

name: Iron Warriors (IV Legion)
description: The IV Legion, masters of siege warfare and artillery

name: White Scars (V Legion)
description: The V Legion, masters of lightning warfare and mounted combat

name: Space Wolves (VI Legion)
description: The VI Legion, the Wolves of Fenris and savage warriors

name: Imperial Fists (VII Legion)
description: The VII Legion, masters of siege warfare and fortification

name: Night Lords (VIII Legion)
description: The VIII Legion, terror incarnate and masters of psychological warfare

name: Blood Angels (IX Legion)
description: The IX Legion, noble warriors with a dark secret in their blood

name: Iron Hands (X Legion)
description: The X Legion, masters of technology and cybernetic enhancement

name: World Eaters (XII Legion)
description: The XII Legion, berserkers who seek close combat above all else

name: Ultramarines (XIII Legion)
description: The XIII Legion, masters of tactical warfare and the Codex Astartes

name: Death Guard (XIV Legion)
description: The XIV Legion, masters of biological warfare and endurance

name: Thousand Sons (XV Legion)
description: The XV Legion, masters of psychic powers and sorcery

name: Luna Wolves (XVI Legion)
description: The XVI Legion, the Warmaster's own and masters of precision strikes

name: Word Bearers (XVII Legion)
description: The XVII Legion, the first to fall to Chaos and masters of faith

name: Salamanders (XVIII Legion)
description: The XVIII Legion, masters of fire and the forge

name: Raven Guard (XIX Legion)
description: The XIX Legion, masters of stealth and guerrilla warfare

name: Alpha Legion (XX Legion)
description: The XX Legion, masters of deception and infiltration
